author: China Uncensored
description:
Operation Honey Pot: Paste this emoji 🍯 in your comment below.
The Chinese Communist Party loves to quote Sun Tzu’s Art of War—especially when it wants to look wise, peaceful, and five steps ahead of everyone else. But here’s the problem: the CCP is lying about what The Art of War actually teaches.

In this episode of China Uncensored, Chris Chappell breaks down how Sun Tzu is routinely misinterpreted—and deliberately misused—by the CCP to mask China’s aggressive strategy toward the United States and its allies.

Star Fox 64 | Deep Thoughts While Gaming https://youtu.be/fhiqQRKy_1s

Want to go deeper than YouTube will let us? Check out our website: https://chinauncensored.tv

Get the free China Uncensored weekly newsletter:
https://chinauncensored.substack.com

title: This is How You Beat Communism
